channel.title: Reid Hoffman on code.zoia.org

item.title: Reid Hoffman and Matt Mullenweg in LinkedIn Speaker Series
item.description: Matt Mullenweg (co-founder of WordPress and CEO of Automattic) and Reid Hoffman (LinkedIn co-founder) share their thoughts about the future of online publishing (among other things).
